translations: n.地图制作，制图；制图学，绘图法

普通地图学, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: The Ricci map gained the nickname the "Impossible Black Tulip of Cartography" because it was so hard to find.
sentences.translation: 利玛窦的地图被称为“地图学上不可能的黑色郁金香”，因为它很难被找到。

sentences.sentence: At last, the worlds of cartography, vexillology and population statistics meet!
sentences.translation: 地图绘制学、旗帜学和人口数据终于汇成了一幅图！

sentences.sentence: Academics came up with the startling images after throwing away 500 years of conventional cartography.
sentences.translation: 学者们抛弃了500年的传统制图法，绘制出了惊人的图像。
